Calculate material losses (ML) from raw facility data

Source: R/anlz_ml_facility.R
anlz_ml_facility.Rd

Calculate material losses (ML) from raw facility data

Usage

anlz_ml_facility(fls)

Arguments

fls

vector of file paths to raw facility data, one to many

Value

data frame that is nearly identical to the input data except results are shown as monthly load as the annual estimate divided by 12. This is for consistency of reporting without sources.

Details

Input data should one row per year per facility, where the row shows the total tons per year of total nitrogen loss.

See also

anlz_ml

Examples

fls <- list.files(system.file('extdata/', package = 'tbeploads'),
  pattern = 'ps_indml', full.names = TRUE)
anlz_ml_facility(fls)
#> Called from: anlz_ml_facility(fls)
#> debug: mlprep <- tidyr::unnest(tidyr::unnest(dplyr::ungroup(dplyr::mutate(tidyr::nest(dplyr::group_by(tibble::tibble(fls = fls), 
#>     fls), .key = "dat"), dat = purrr::map(fls, read.table, skip = 0, 
#>     sep = "\t", header = T), entinfo = purrr::map(fls, util_ps_facinfo, 
#>     asdf = T))), "entinfo"), "dat")
#> debug: ml <- dplyr::select(dplyr::mutate(dplyr::full_join(tidyr::crossing(unique(mlprep[, 
#>     c("year", "entity", "facname")]), Month = 1:12), mlprep,
